LanguageData.DiscoverAncientComplex.label: 고대 유적 발견
LanguageData.DiscoverAncientComplex.effectDesc: 당신은 인근의 고대 유적의 위치를 발견할 것입니다.
LanguageData.DiscoverAncientComplex.letterInfoText: 당신은 숨겨져 있던 고대 유적의 위치를 입수했습니다.
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.label: 가축의 합류
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.effectDesc: a group of farm animals will be attracted and join the colony.
LanguageData.FarmAnimalsWanderIn.letterInfoText: Curious farm animals have wandered in, attracted by the commotion.
LanguageData.GauranlenTreePod.label: 요정열매 새싹
LanguageData.InsectJellyTunnels.label: 곤충 젤리
LanguageData.InsectJellyTunnels.letterInfoText: 지하의 곤충 군락이 젤리 더미를 남겼습니다.
LanguageData.NearbyFactionGoodwill.label: nearby faction goodwill
LanguageData.NearbyFactionGoodwill.effectDesc: you will gain goodwill from the nearest faction base.
LanguageData.RandomRecruit.label: random recruit
LanguageData.RandomRecruit.effectDesc: 50% chance of random recruit of the same ideoligion joining your colony.
LanguageData.RandomRecruit.letterInfoText: A wanderer has arrived and wants to join your colony.
